The following is a list of books related to Buddhism:

Introductions and general texts[edit]

  • What the Buddha Taught. Walpola Rahula (1959) (revised 1974). Grove Press: ISBN 978-0802130310 ISBN 0802130313
  • Catching up with the Buddha: How Psychology, Brain Science and Eastern Philosophy Are Changing Our Understanding of What It Means to be Human. Chris Niebauer (2019). Hierophant Publishing: ISBN 978-1938289767 ISBN 1938289765
  • The Buddha and His Dhamma. Dr. B. R. Ambedkar (1957). Oxford University Press: ISBN 978-0198068679 ISBN 0198068670
